description: Relax and stretch with a calming outdoor yoga session by the Aasee, perfect for a peaceful group experience surrounded by nature.

locationInfo.description: A tranquil outdoor yoga session held near Aasee, offering stunning lake views while practicing mindfulness and stretching.
safetyTips: Bring a yoga mat or towel for comfort.
Wear comfortable clothing suitable for yoga.
Ensure proper hydration before and after the session.

description: Challenge your group to a friendly game of mini golf at Minigolfanlage, offering a fun and competitive outdoor activity for everyone.

locationInfo.description: A lively mini-golf course located in the heart of Münster, offering a relaxed yet competitive environment for groups of all ages.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable shoes for walking around the course.
Stay aware of other players when swinging the club.
Take turns and enjoy the friendly competition.

description: Explore Münster's historic center with your group on a scavenger hunt, solving clues and discovering hidden gems in the city.

locationInfo.description: A fun and engaging scavenger hunt through Münster’s historic streets, where teams will solve clues and find famous landmarks.
safetyTips: Work together as a team to solve clues.
Be respectful of public spaces and fellow participants.

description: Enjoy a relaxing picnic in the beautiful Schlosspark with your group, offering peaceful green space and scenic views.

locationInfo.description: A charming park located near the castle, perfect for a picnic with open spaces, paths, and beautiful nature all around.
safetyTips: Bring a blanket and picnic supplies.
Take care of any litter and dispose of it properly.

description: Rent a small boat at Aasee and enjoy a relaxing time with your group, paddling around the lake and taking in the beautiful surroundings.

locationInfo.description: Rent a boat at Aasee and spend time with your group enjoying the water, making it a perfect outdoor activity for sunny weather.
safetyTips: Wear life jackets for safety on the water.
Follow the rental shop’s instructions for boat handling.
Stay together as a group to enjoy the experience.
